column5: After reading many french reports on fishing sites in Quebec regarding the situation on the Gouin I can tell you that the majority of the outfitters made the appropriate adjustements and operations are almost normal. In regard of fishing all the guys (clients) that are back are saying fishing is the best they ever seen. Catch & Release was the way to go. Not that I had any doubt but McQ you were perfectly right with your previous reports; yo got a very reliable network. Thank you. So for those who wants to have the walleye trip of their life; Gouin is the way to go but just ask the outfitter that you're going to do business with, what did he do to counter-act the situation and the impact for his client if any impact.
